plot outline: The film revolves around the lives of two childhood friends Sreekuttan and Anwar, who fall for the same girl, People of a not so developed island in Kerala struggle to understand the corporate and political games around. Similar politics are being played by Sreekuttan and Anwar to woo their childhood friend Mina. Will they manage to get her without hurting each other?
title: Kosrakollikal
plot: The film revolves around the lives of two childhood friends Sreekuttan and Anwar, who fall for the same girl, People of a not so developed island in Kerala struggle to understand the corporate and political games around. Similar politics are being played by Sreekuttan and Anwar to woo their childhood friend Mina. Will they manage to get her without hurting each other?
